title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files do not appear in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list.
EB: The files should persist in the MRU list between sessions.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Open multiple files.
3. Close the software.
4. Reopen the software.
5. Check the File menu MRU list and note that the previously opened files are not listed.
